alert.note: Alert for Larimer (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 3:46PM MDT until July 15 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Larimer County in north central Colorado... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 346 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles south of Stove Prairie, or 16 miles west of Fort Collins, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Buckhorn Mountain around 350 PM MDT. Drake around 405 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Masonville and Cedar Cove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
